events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and our HR team will begin reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the engineering department due to your previous developer experience.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
Your initial screening call went well. We discussed your background in development and your familiarity with relevant technologies.
Thank you for the positive screening feedback. Iâ€™m very excited about the opportunity to contribute to the software engineering team.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th at 10 AM UTC to assess your developer and coding skills.
The technical interview with our engineering panel was successfully completed, and the feedback highlighted your strong problem-solving skills.
Your HR interview has been arranged for April 25th to discuss company culture, benefits, and next steps after the engineering round.
